title: Gymnasium at Akragas
description: An architectural complex in the upper agora of Akragas (modern Agrigento) dedicated to Hermes and Heracles that was probably used as gymnasium. It appears to have been built in Hellenistic time and renovated in the Augustan period.

properties.description: Location of the ancient architectural complex in the agora of Agrigento known as "Gymnasium", based on a representative point in Open Street Map
properties.title: OSM location of the Gymnasium at Akragas
